translation.vi: I'm so in love with you, okay?

translation.en: [Mrs. Richmond] Are you going to tell me what's going on?
translation.vi:
[Mrs. Richmond] Are you going to
tell me what's going on?

translation.en: You show up out of the blue.
translation.vi: You show up out of the blue.

translation.en: It's not a holiday or my birthday.
translation.vi:
It's not a holiday
or my birthday.

translation.en: Sometimes people are only in our lives
translation.vi:
Sometimes people
are only in our lives

translation.en: to appreciate that time we had
translation.vi: to appreciate that time we had

translation.en: Once upon a time, before your father,
translation.vi:
Once upon a time,
before your father,

translation.en: I was seeing a young man.
translation.vi: I was seeing a young man.

translation.en: But it became very clear he wasn't ready for me,
translation.vi:
But it became very clear
he wasn't ready for me,

translation.en: if I was going to wait for him or move on.
translation.vi:
if I was going to wait for him
or move on.

translation.en: I don't think I'll ever forget that love I felt.
translation.vi:
I don't think I'll ever forget
that love I felt.

translation.en: And if I could do it over again,
translation.vi:
And if I could do it
over again,

translation.en: I would still fall in love.
translation.vi: I would still fall in love.

translation.en: No one can take it away from you.

No one can take it away
from you.

translation.en: -[Stevie] I'm so happy for you. -Thank you.

translation.en: I wanna introduce you to someone please.
